# Containers Docs

## Containers

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/containers/overview.md): Learn about the .NET SDK container creation feature, including telemetry, publishing considerations, and build properties.
- [.NET SDK publishing tutorial](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/containers/sdk-publish.md): In this tutorial, you learn how to containerize a .NET application with dotnet publish command without the use of a Dockerfile.
- [.NET SDK publishing reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/containers/publish-configuration.md): Reference material for containerizing a .NET app and configuring the container image.
